column4: Hi all: I've got kind of a strange sound problem. Is anyone willing to try and help me?
JacobSingh... There should be a folder called PDF in you home folder
thanks!  Is there anyway to have it ask me where I want to save it?
You're welcome. I do not know of any way to "print" to a different location. But you can always create a shortcut of the PDF folder in another location for quicker access
